channel.title: Wtf
channel.description: With all clients like the erased pkz client for the [pi] source. This happens with all clients such as Hybrid PvP, Frozen-world, like and its just the clients that are made for the models for this [pi] source. I get this [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/260pv5y.jpg[/img] When me and my beta testers are on we will randomly dc due to these erros. And it happens a lotttttttt.... I only like this source because it has torva and i have yet to find another 317 with primal and torva. I tried a different 317 to see if that client would do it and it doesnt. Infact its totally lag free. Its just the stupid fucking client idk what the fuck is wrong with it.
